attributes.action: carry out an in-depth investigation into the operation of the Office of the Public Guardian to allay the fears of those who feel that it may be failing to meet its duty of care to those whose affairs it supervises and to those who are responsible for their day-to-day care, and to take any measures necessary to ensure that it provides the service that its users have a right to expect.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Office of the Public Guardian supervises the financial affairs of those who, for health reasons, are unable to manage their own affairs. Many of those who have had dealings with it feel that it fails to provide the service needed by both those whose affairs it supervises and their carers. This petition asks the Prime Minister to carry out an investigation into the operation of the Office of the Public Guardian and to ensure that it provides the service that its users have a right to expect.
